A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Excellent edition to the star wars saga.  There were some moments that seemed forced (comedic lines and that one Leia scene) but overall i thoroughly enjoyed the direction rian johnson took with the film.  this was star wars for me.  i don't understand all the flak this film is getting right now besides everyone wanting Luke to be this super bad ass jedi that just runs around defeating the FO singlehandedly.  \n\nAdam driver killed his role as Kylo Ren and i couldn't be more excited to see what he does in Episode 9.  go see the film! i hope you won't be as disappointed as all these haters blowing up this film right now...
